name: Pk's Unnamed VR Shooter Game
description:
This is an extremely early level mock-up for a VR game that I happen to be working on. Looking for any feedback I can get on the weapon mechanics, sorry that there's currently only one gun at the moment but there will be some variety in the near future!

Development is taking place with an HTC Vive, so if you have a Rift or WMR headset this demo may or may not run, I honestly do not know as of right now.

MOTION SICKNESS WARNING: This game currently only has artificial sliding locomotion with no comfort options. If you are prone to VR sickness you'll want to avoid this game until I get around to adding comfort options and/or alternate locomotion methods.
